Review: This vacuum is a complete waste of money.
Terrible at picking up pet hair.
The suction power is pathetically weak.
I regret not buying a different brand.
Makes an awful screeching noise while running.
Can't believe how poorly designed this is.
I hate how heavy and clunky this vacuum is.
The battery life is embarrassingly short.
Not worth even half the price.
The wheels got stuck after a few uses.
The attachments keep falling off during use.
The cord is annoyingly short for my needs.
The handle is uncomfortable to hold.
Actually works well on hardwood floors.
The dust container is too small and messy to empty.
Disappointed by how loud this vacuum cleaner is.
It's surprisingly good at corner cleaning.
Leaves debris behind most of the time.
It broke down after just two months of use.
Frustrated by how quickly the filter clogs up.
